messages.text:
i’m wondering if in the future we would like some kind of heatmap option for homepage, like

 `wpcom_homepage_link_click` with properties: signup_top, signup_bottom, xyz, abc, etc
because i imagine the places we link people will vary quite a bit with tests
> If there are 2 buttons on the page going to the same link, you could differentiate them by putting in a query parameter to the url
wondering why that is better than adding a tracks event
once we have user properties, we should be able to tell if a specific user is a paid user at a given point in time
but we can't really do that efficiently yet
